doc: Information about the last checkin from the scale
name: checkin

fields.name: stamp
fields.doc: A unix timestamp indicating the time at which the checkin occurred

fields.name: macaddress
fields.doc: The macaddress of the withings device

fields.name: model
fields.doc: The withings model id for the device checking in

fields.name: batteryLevel
fields.doc: The current battery level as a percentage

fields.name: firmware
fields.doc: The current firmware of the device
